name: Mandarin Chicken Salad
ingredients: 3-­‐4 boneless, skinless chicken breast cut in bite-­‐sized pieces
1 pkg. Ramen noodles, oriental flavor, crushed in to small pieces
1 can mandarin oranges, drained, reserving liquid
2 Tbs. vinegar Seasoning packet from Ramen noodles
2 Tbs. mandarin orange juice 1/2 cup salad oil
steps: Stir fry chicken in 1-­‐2 Tbs. soy sauce and 1-­‐2 tbs. oil until done. Set aside and refrigerate. Melt 2Tbs. Butter
in a small frying pan and add Ramen noodles. Cook while stirring until evenly browned. Set aside to cool.
Meanwhile, tear lettuce into bite sized pieces. Add mandarin oranges and toss. Mix dressing ingredients with wire
whisk until well blended. When chicken and noodles are cool toss into salad. Just before serving, pour dressing
